list_definition.definition: to decide or announce that (something already arranged etc) will not be done etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He used an electric stamp cancelling machine to cancel the mail.

list_definition.definition: to stop payment of (a cheque/check, subscription etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Banks usually charge for cancelling a cheque.
